name: asc-transform-example

scripts.asbuild:debug: npm run build-transform && asc assembly/index.ts --target debug --transform ./build/transform.mjs
scripts.asbuild:release: npm run build-transform && asc assembly/index.ts --target release --transform ./build/transform.mjs
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release

author: Clifton Kaznocha
description: An example of an AssemblyScript compiler transform
